channel.title: RuneSMF - A Runescape Forum theme(identicle)! [New & Legal]
channel.description:
[center][b][size=20pt][anchor=contents]Table of contents[/anchor][/size][/b] [iurl=#contents]Table of Contents[/iurl] [iurl=#description]Description[/iurl] [iurl=#download]Download[/iurl] [iurl=#preview]Preview[/iurl] [iurl=#credits]Credits[/iurl]
[b][size=20pt][anchor=description]Description[/anchor][/size][/b] The theme is an almost-identicle mirror to the runescape forums. Many would agree, it puts an interesting twist to your runescape website. It looks like runescape forums, smells like runescape forums, tastes like runescape forums, and sounds like another mike vartan creation.
[b][size=20pt][anchor=download]Download[/anchor][/size][/b] [font=Arial][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?6ftxthfvtbn]
Download
[/url][/font]
[b][size=20pt][anchor=preview]Preview[/anchor][/size][/b] [b]Live Preview:[/b] http://www.runepoints.com/forums/index.php? (may not be current v.)
[b][size=20pt][anchor=credits]Credits[/anchor][/size][/b] 5% credits to sloopz because i used his theme as structural guidelines. 10% to Runescape for the background image and inspiration 85% Mike Vartan(ThatOneServer) [/center]

Made it myself took a while because I made the left and right columns and the majority of the middle in mspaint. Still, not bad for mspaint.

I like the toy-like look.

item.source: RuneSMF - A Runescape Forum theme(identicle)! [New & Legal]

item.title: RuneSMF - A Runescape Forum theme(identicle)! [New & Legal]
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

[quote=“Triton, post:32, topic:161399”][quote author=ThatOneServer link=topic=219666.msg1977131#msg1977131 date=1199511149]

I see many phished accounts as a result of this

I don’t. A css style can never fish passwords and send them to another server

And as for the background, why don’t you just recreate it yourself? Make an identical one or even something different in photoshop, as long as its made from scratch.

²

He means people will use this like they use a fake runescape site to steal passwords

SMF is MD5’d anyways
[/quote]

It’s not like it is difficult make it store clear-text passwords.[/quote]
Yeah but anybody who’s dumb enough to fall for it is dumb enough to put their real password on an actual SMF board.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneSMF - A Runescape Forum theme(identicle)! [New & Legal]

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSMF - A Runescape Forum theme(identicle)! [New & Legal]
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

Nice. I love the layout. could you update the download link though? The link is broken.
And btw, nice site. I like how you used PHP to calculate how many players are currently on your server, how many accounts have been made, and how you used it to generate a image displaying the calculation feedback.

Read full topic
